content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: RevokeCertificate path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/ssl/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/certificates/{certificate_id}/revoke content: params
name stackid
in path
required true
desc a stack id or slug
schema
type str
name certificateid
in path
required true
desc a certificate id
schema
type str
sum revoke a certificate
responses
title: 6_Certificates_RevokeCertificate_32.json
